description: Finding a remote island's TV channel becomes a quirky adventure.
title: TV Island Quest
n_1: Rob and Ella land on a deserted island, looking bewildered.
n_2: They explore the island, finding an old TV set.
n_3: After searching, they find a remote under some leaves.
n_4: They turn on the TV and it displays 'Welcome to TV Island!'
c2_4: Guess we found the TV island!
